title: Ticonderoga Tri-Conderoga Triangular Pencils, Wood-Cased #2, Sharpener, Soft Touch Comfort Barrel, Black, 12-Pack (22500)
description: Tri-Conderoga’s thicker diameter and unique soft touch finish make it more comfortable than a standard pencil. The ergonomic, triangular shape promotes proper pencil grip and helps alleviate hand tension while writing. Top quality, latex-free erasers provide easy, clean corrections. A large diameter sharpener is included. PMA certified non-toxic.
